name: Crystal  - Hard
description: A sadly required meta item, activate to harden the body.

name: Crystal  - Glittering
description: A sadly required meta item, activate to gain a harder to damage glittering skin. A hard body is required for this to affect you.

name: Crystal  - Crystallized
description: A sadly required meta item, activate to crystallize your flesh. A glittering body is required for this to affect you.

name: Crystal  - Hardened teeth
description: A sadly required meta item, activate to harden your teeth and eat faster.

name: Crystal  - Stone chewer
description: A sadly required meta item, activate to gain the toughest of teeth and jaw muscles and eat at the pace of none other. Already hardened teeth are required for this to affect you.

name: Crystal  - Crystalline eyes
description: A sadly required meta item, activate to turn your eyes into crystalline lenses perfected for vision.

name: Crystal  - Crystal claws
description: A sadly required meta item, activate to gain claws of hard crystal with which to pierce your foes. A crystallized body is required for this to affect you.

name: Crystal  - Claw miner
description: A sadly required meta item, activate to gain the ability to dig through earth and stone. Crystalline claws are required for this to affect you.
